name: Lim
header: Lim is a father of eight from Cambodia who needs $225 to treat mature cataracts.
description:
“Lim is married with eight children and 20 grandchildren,” says our medical partner, Children’s Surgical Centre (CSC). "He likes to listen to the news and watch boxing on Sunday afternoons.”

Unfortunately, Lim’s ability to watch his favorite sport is made difficult by his mature cataracts. For the last four years, Lim has lived with worsening blurry vision caused by these cataracts. He is no longer able to work in his fields or go anywhere on his own.

With $225 in funding, Lim will receive surgery to remove these cataracts, replacing his original lenses with artificial ones. Following surgery, Lim should have clear vision in both eyes, giving him the freedom to work and relax independently.

CSC shares, “After surgery, Lim plans to go back and plant crops on the farm and go places on his own.”
